=== Breve Descripción Personal ===

Tengo 27 años de edad, vivo en Caracas - Distrito Federal, me empecé a familiarizar con Ubuntu GNU/Linux 10.10 (Maverick Meerkat) que se publicó en el año 2010, al comprobar que era un sistema operativo seguro, estable y ligero; decidi usarlo. Sin experiencia sobre su manejo, empece a indagar; encontrando un amigo de la Comunidad Ubuntu Venezuela <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CesarSilva|CesarSilva]]</nowiki> (cmsv20) quien me convencio de formar parte de este maravilloso mundo..

=== Brief Description Personal ===

I have 27 years of age, living in Caracas - Federal District, I started using Ubuntu GNU / Linux 10.10 (Maverick Meerkat) published in 2010, to see that it was an operating system secure, stable and lightweight, decided to use, No experience on its management, I began to investigate finding a friend from Venezuela Ubuntu Community <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CesarSilva|CesarSilva]]</nowiki> (cmsv20) who convinced me to join this wonderful world.
